title: Co-ops at work in Solomon Islands
creator_credit: Don Murray, Film Australia and Graham Chase
brief_description: Describes the various co-operatives in the Solomon Islands. These are an important part of economic life and assist villagers in the production and distribution of timber, foodstuffs, copra and exports which are regulated by the Central Co-op Association in the capital Honiara.
creator_credit_for_label: Don Murray, Film Australia and Graham Chase
